title: Client issue
body: Does anyone lately have problems with client like logging more than minute, cant start a game for like 15 mins(sitting in play button, cant chose game mode to start game)? Repaired the client but the problem is still on so i though that reinstalling will not help, im sure its server problem i let me know if anyone else have the same problem!

replies.body:
Thanks for the reports everyone.  I'm still trying to get an idea of what's going on, but it sounds like a few are having connection issues on the client or during champion select.  The reports also seem to be isolated to EU players so I'm curious if there might be some ISP issue going on.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to your region's game server so we can see if your network is running into any hiccups wihle trying to reach us:

EUW: 192.64.170.252
EUNE: 31.186.224.42

This should help get to the bottom of what's going on.

Same problem in romania

WinMTR screen
http://imgur.com/AIlwfSj

Store seems to work.
Loot page and champion icons and  name dosent load.

Thanks!  This confirms my suspicions.  :/  I was able to reach out to our noc and was able to find any issues on our servers, so there's likely an ISP issue going on.  These logs are showing that your ping is sky rocketing at your third hop, well before reaching our game services.  I recommend taking this log, and contacting your ISP.  They should be able to pinpoint their node and fix up whatever is causing that spike.
OMG stop trying to point and blame someone else and fix the problem !

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=o94zoaEs,comment-id=000d00000000,timestamp=2017-06-22T17:54:56.037+0000)
>
> Thanks!  This confirms my suspicions.  :/  I was able to reach out to our noc and was able to find any issues on our servers, so there's likely an ISP issue going on.  These logs are showing that your ping is sky rocketing at your third hop, well before reaching our game services.  I recommend taking this log, and contacting your ISP.  They should be able to pinpoint their node and fix up whatever is causing that spike.

i highly doubt its purely the isp's fault, i dont believe in one day a bunch of different networks fucked something up, at the exact same time, the chances of that happening is minimal to none. plus my ping doesnt skyrocket at the ''third hop'' at anything else than the client, no other game, overwatch, world of warcraft, cod, csgo, everything works normal, except league of legends only in the eu servers, please atleast provide us with useful information or an estimated time of when it could be fixed, or more detailed information about this.{{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}} ------{{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:32}}  tyty {{champion:33}} {{item:3117}} {{item:3117}} {{item:3117}} {{item:3086}} {{item:3086}} {{item:3086}} {{item:3086}}

I can confirm its the isp, tried on another isp, and it works flawless

Have a nice day

I have a small isp and the problem dosent seem to be local, it seems its higher up the networking chain.
everything work quite fast 8080, or other games.

So i dont think we can do anyting as users.
So...what if we can't just change our ISP? And how is it possible that ISP is affecting multiple people across few countries??

When you say sitting in play button, do you mean that you go to the map selection but there are no options?  Or do you mean that you can't select Play at all?  Toss me a screenshot so I can get a better understanding of what's going on.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=o94zoaEs,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2017-06-22T16:25:06.205+0000)
>
> When you say sitting in play button, do you mean that you go to the map selection but there are no options?  Or do you mean that you can't select Play at all?  Toss me a screenshot so I can get a better understanding of what's going on.

Its mostly bulgarians and people that live near bulgaria that have this issue, pretty much u can read this post to get a better understanding.https://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/Uv6mc3w3-league-client-stuck-on-authenticating Its stuck in auth for 4/5mins, after that stuck in loading for awhile, after that recconecting for a long time, in champ select cant see champs or pick anything, in loading screen it wont even load into the game but say we have no internet, 1200 views and 75comments, please dont ignore this.

Thanks!  I'll forward this info and try to find out what's going on.  I'll offer updates if any come my way!

In the meantime, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to go over some basic troubleshooting.  It will also include steps like configuring your DNS which may change how your network is routing to our services.  Going over these steps is crucial towards figuring out the issue!

The problem at least for me is fixed right now!! I'm in-game so great job dealing with the issue. I just wanted to link this video I made yesterday to shed some light on exactly what the issue was for any future problems (hopefully not) or just to clear the misconceptions because its one thing to describe totally different to see so here it is >>> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xg1-eHfJWLY 

There is only one other instance that occurs but because its a slow process of getting into the game and it doesn't happen every time I didn't record it. It basically is after you press start the timer actually shows and starts counting and when a queue pops you accept but you don't really accept because after 20s you get back to lobby and if you do this several times you get a message that you declined too many games!

**Update:** Ok we still have some issues I checked with the discussion on eu boards and others have this too. Game works, que works everything is good until you get in-game! While playing from time to time at random we get "lag spikes" even tho our ms is low (mine is 33 and not changing). These "lag spikes" cause complete freezes or animations not playing!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=o94zoaEs,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2017-06-22T16:25:06.205+0000)
>
> When you say sitting in play button, do you mean that you go to the map selection but there are no options?  Or do you mean that you can't select Play at all?  Toss me a screenshot so I can get a better understanding of what's going on.

it seems to only be a client problem, not an ingame problem.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=o94zoaEs,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2017-06-22T16:25:06.205+0000)
>
> When you say sitting in play button, do you mean that you go to the map selection but there are no options?  Or do you mean that you can't select Play at all?  Toss me a screenshot so I can get a better understanding of what's going on.

also, whenever we can finally get ingame, one way or another, i managed to get ingame earlier somehow after an hour, and my ping was fine (costom game ) 35 ping as usual, good fps, everything working fine, also i made an account in na logged in there, 0 problems, everything working perfectly except ofc the 160 ping which is because of the distance of the na server.

*update* I got into the client, found a game, got in champ select but I couldn't see the champions, so I couldn't ban and got dropped out of queue.

what in the f*** is happening
this is great i pay for mission pack and now i cant get the points.

(1)To log from new client, i have the old one so i log in ther press launch and then i get to the new one, how can i fix it??(2)Many times,i cant lock in or ban or even client stops when timer hit 0 so I must close client and like this i am losing Lp sometimes i am getting into the game but still cant open client and i always end up with leaver buster.(3) my clent is not opening most of the time and after the end of the game when pressing continue it doesnt do anything and i am forced to close and then w8 10 mis to open it again cause it doesnt open(sometimes it is opening) i have tried the full repair but nothing can you help me please???
Same problem here, both on EUW and EUNE {{champion:32}}

I was able to play one co-ops game, then the same thing happened.-_-
Please Riot, just do something.
Thank God.Its finally working for me(hope this will never happen for me and for us).
I've been waiting for a whole day and riot is not even stressing out to help us.I guess, we will have to wait till the next patch, cuz Riot doesn't care about this situation right now.

To be fair, it's not easy to find the source of a problem that only affects some people (yesterday I had this problem, but my friends didn't).  If it was every single player in the two EU regions, it'd probably be easier to pin-point the source and fix whatever's wrong.
Yeah, that's also true, but I think the could care more about the community, because it's their game.Also, I think they are working on it because I can't even log in right now.

Greetings from EUNE, same problem...
Here is my WINMTR info: https://pastebin.com/8GcYBSyP 
P.S I'm from Bulgaria...

I am trying to log in for an hour now. Logged in 2 times already and couldn't start a game. It was telling me that  I have no connection or something like that. Back in the day we fixed that by just openning Internet Explorer. It did not fix anything this time. I repaired the game and nothing changed. I am almost 100% sure that the problem is not in my pc. {{item:3151}}

Its not a pc or connection problem i done all connecting issue instructions to chek if i have problem with that, this is the first time im experiencing this problem and its not from my internet or pc its definitely a server problem and im still waiting for them to fix it im checking every hour and still nothing...

The league clint says that there is some problem with the connection and i dont get it since i done all the connection instructions... Something is just buggy. Icons dont load i cant click play button or change game mode for around 20 mins and if i somehow get in queue and in champ select cant see champs and im instantly kicked from it because i cant select a champ. Thats all i see.
Tryed to repair the client this problem is still on i havent only reinstalled the game but since repair doesnt work i dont think that reinstalling will

same problem here i am from greece 5 min to log in and when i press confirme to enter a game i take an issue.. something with my internet connection.. i dont know whats going on.. i never have problms like this before..

Same problem here, I'm in Bulgaria and I strongly suspect it's ISP related... It takes forever to log in and once in champion/ban select a lot of the UI won't load, including the champions for picks. can't even join a game to spectate. Yesterday it was working fine. Here's hoping tomorrow is fixed.

Same problem here..
Well I even can't go to loot, 
I see blank profile->overview page, 
when in lobby(after 10 min) can't leave lobby, 
can't add bots in custom game, 
when I press start game in lobby the icon just turns grey (well after 20 min I got the message: Cannot start game)
when invited need 30sec to get in the lobby, there I can't click on suggested (or invited..don't really know)  or even see who's invited and I can't see summoner icons,
if my friends start i can't see that...

 Tried repairing, reinstalling nothing seems to be working-_-

This specific issue sounds like a network issue communicating with our services, so you'll see black screens because assets are failing to download.  My suggestion would be to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to remove any blocks and instability for this.  I hope that helps!
I did all that, DNS set to google, no packet loss, release renew ip... nothing helped

DNS related problem 

http://imgur.com/DktE59S
probably the server doesn't allow pinging

I doubt that the problem is on  ISP cause a lot of people are having the same problem across Europe, i share the same network company with my friend who lives like next to me and hes client works just fine, i even log in to his router and nothing really happened, so


a MTR screen
http://prntscr.com/fmzxfa

So.....i`m having this kind of problem all day long. I tried everything that i can to fix it... even Reinstall the game while my Roommate play the game with 0 problems on his computer WITH the same router.He is in EU NE i`m in EU west so i decided to try play it Nordic but it have the same problem...MY point Here is that it is INDIVIDUALLY and have NOTHING to do with the internet provider/router etc. I`m trying to make a video and post it here so that you can finally GOT the idea of what`s going on here :D

Exactly the same problem here in Romania.It takes around 4 to 5 minutes to log in, and then, when I'm finally logged in, I can't play.I press play, blind pick, confirm and that's it.It just freezes and I can't even press the "x" button to leave.Plus, when I get an invite, I can hear the noise it makes, but I can't accept or decline because it doesn't show up.I hope that until next day, which is 23/06/2017 I can play League again.Thank you.
Did u find any solution for this please riot fix this soon as possible.

not only that the client is laging like hell and cant log in for 10 min but all my champions are missing from account !!!!!
Made it one game but i cant ban or pick anuthing and now im blocked for 5 min and put in a lower tier i want my champions and skins back and this blocking option removed!!!!!!
And by the locks of it this problem is global !!!! 
I will freaking submit a ticket evry 5 min until i get a normal respon from someone not a bot assigned to copy paste a messge in the tickets !!!!!

So no info?
I cam home like 4 hours ago, wanted to play a game of league couldn't even load into client, was tuck on loading for like 10 min. i gave up, figured riot at it again, 4 hours later i can log in but nothing loads.

> [{quoted}](name=aAsio,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=o94zoaEs,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-06-22T10:10:01.477+0000)

Repaired the client but the problem is still on so i though that reinstalling will not help, im sure its server problem i let me know if anyone else have the same problem!

I have the same problem all day long .. But no no no , NOT RIOTS problem ofc , we are all crazy with wooden pcs who dont know how to use them right..Please now log out and go buy the new skins...Thats what matters..

Yep, been having this all day.Great job by Riot once again, I pay for pass and I am not able to complete my VS. missions because they don't care about their servers.Everyones been posting about this problem today all day, yet they don't care and won't respond.I also submitted a support ticket few hours ago, ignored aswell.Clap clap, good job Riot.

That's not really fair to say, if I'm not even understanding what the issue you're having is.  :/  Let me know what's happening exactly, what you're seeing, error messages.  I'm happy to help if I can.

Basically, the client is slow overall, takes like 5 minutes to log in after I type in my password.Afterwards, at first, I wasn't able to play at all, like I can press the Play button, but as soon as I click on "Find Match" nothing happens, it's like as if I'm in a queue, but I am not.Once I click on "Find a Match" the button goes grey and becomes inactive, and I can't even press the "X" on it to retry and nothing happens.
Afterwards(few hours later) I go into queue and once a match is found and I accept, I go into champion select.When I do, I am unable to see any champions to pick and it basically remains like that untill the time runs out and then it says I dodged and failed to pick a champion.
Also, like I said earlier, the client overall is really slow.
I have same problem pls help for that if u see where is the problem

I have had the same issue all day since i woke up. It's been 10 hours, i've restarted my computer and league over 30 times. I've tried reinstalling it and re-patching it. Nothing works. Takes 30 minutes to log me in. Can't see my profile, can't see my loot and I can't start a game or see invites from friends. it was working fine yesterday and I'm so confused what is happening Riot?!
I have the same problem (I don't even see friend invites)
Atleast im not the only one :(

1. I tried god damn eerything nothing works for me....never had thsi issue before had no clue what is going on. riot would post this problem already if this would be something with server.{{summoner:1}}
